query: WITH entities AS (SELECT process_type, id FROM policies WHERE (COALESCE((process_type, id) < ($3, $2), $2 IS NULL)) ORDER BY process_type DESC, id DESC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: PolicyId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN policy_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.process_type desc, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
